alert.note: Alert for Jones; Monroe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 1:43PM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River at GA 18 at Dames Ferry affecting Monroe and Jones Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River at GA 18 at Dames Ferry. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16 feet, Minor flooding of woodlands in the natural flood plain begins along the river. Low lying areas and portions of river access roads...upstream and downstream from the gage on Dames Ferry Road or Georgia Highway 18 will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM EDT Monday the stage was 16.2 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 16 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
